article: Dear Tom, My name is Liu Yun. I'm a 12 year-old girl. I'm the only  _  in my family. My birthday is  _  1st. It's the  _  day of the tenth month. It's also the National Day. We have a  _  time! What's your age ?  What  is your birthday? Can you let me know? Yours, Liu Yun
